website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, this basket is a reasonable choice for anyone who prefers natural materials and wants a classic-looking design.
pros: Crafted by hand with woven palm leaves that are naturally strong
Relatively spacious but not extremely heavy
Includes a complete bedding set with foam padding, bumper, and blanket
Bedding is available in several attractive colors

customer_reviews.title: Did not love this
customer_reviews.text: For the quality of construction and what you are actually getting, WAY over-priced. It's flimsy, and due to the length and location of the handles, tips in either direction depending on where the baby is positioned. Maybe if you were just going to lay the baby in the basket and that's it, then fine, or if it's just for decoration purposes like literally just a basket to hold other gifts, okay. If you actually wanted to carry a baby in it - no go. Also while the liner for the sided of the basket is surprisingly nice, the pad at the bottom is meh -just flimsy foam.
customer_reviews.author: Laura DeSilva

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I expected something this expensive to be a little more sturdy. This would work great as a photo prop, but not for actual use. I would expect the bottom to fall out or a handle to snap after only using a few times.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful basket and blanket!
customer_reviews.text: My gift was a hit at the baby shower! I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the basket AND the cover with the baby blanket. I'm solo glad I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie E. Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used a Moses Basket for my kids and wanted to give one to my son and daughter-in-law for their baby. This is just what I was looking for. The cable pattern bedding that is included makes it a special baby shower gift. I'm very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. A.

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but baby didn’t fit in it for long. And the foam cushion is not water resistant. I was always worried a blow out diaper would ruin it. Additionally it’s impossible to find covers that fit. I use it a toy box now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rick

customer_reviews.title: Parents loved the basket
customer_reviews.text: As many others have said, it’s a great way to make as a gift basket for holding additional baby gifts. I thought this basket was well made and was glad I could get a different color bedding from the same company in addition to the gray cable knit so the parents can always have clean bedding available.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, sturdy, an amazing baby carrier!
customer_reviews.text: The basket is absolutely stunning! It’s a baby gift so I’m unable to comment on functionality. But if looks count - awesome!
customer_reviews.author: bernie hubner

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous piece, loving it! Would recommend for quality and style. Very glad we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Kizziar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend's baby and they LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Well made and looks like it should have ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Well made and looks like it should have cost 3 times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with purchase! Beautiful and Sturdy! Will be my go to gift for all my kids and stepchildren as they start their own families.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Apel

customer_reviews.title: Loved but was sent the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. Although I was sent the wrong color. I ordered white and was sent a light grey. Still love the product. The basket was heavy and the inside pad was a decent thickness too.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: High quality, well made
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this basket. It exceeded my expectations in all ways. It's large and well made, and the cable knit accessories are soft and thick. I'm really pleased with this purchase, it's going to make a great baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: BlueMoon

product_meta.title: Tadpoles Deluxe Cable Knit Moses Basket and Bedding Set, Grey
product_meta.description: Color:Grey| Style:Basket and Bedding Set| Pattern:Cable KnitA great first bed for baby. Woven from pure Moroccan palm leaf, the Moses Basket has been a popular baby bedding solution for centuries and offers baby a comfortable and secure alternative to bassinets and cradles. Recommended for use with newborns up to 15 lbs or 3 months, the Moses basket keeps baby close at hand during an afternoon or evening snooze. Once your baby outgrows the basket, turn the baby basket into a laundry or storage basket. Warning: Moses basket is NOT for carrying baby; make sure baby is out of the basket before it is picked up or moved.
feature_bullets: MATERIAL: Basket is made of natural, hand-woven palm leaf. Oval Shaped, Lightweight, with Handles at both sides. Durable and organic. Bedding is 100% and machine washable.
DIMENSIONS:Measures: 33 x 10 x 14 inches.Measurements may vary slightly (1-2 inches) as these items are handmade
INCLUDES: Moses Basket Set is a complete unit, and includes the bedding set of padded bumper, foam pad with removable cotton cover, and coordinating blanket, and the hand woven Moses Basket.
MULTI-FUNCTION: Bedding can be removed as baby's grows and basket can be used for storage of toys & books, or for laundry.
ADDITIONAL INFO: Perfect for newborns up to 3 months or 15 lbs. Babies over 3 months or 15 lbs should not use the Moses Basket.
Bedding is sewn and assembled in Brooklyn, USA. Basket is made in Morocco

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars351 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
